name: No Escape (itch) (Garuda Games)
description:
Get ready for a clean experience.


Note a survival horror game I tried something new this time.


*Let me know if you wants a Mac Build*

Please note that I was rushing on the menus, and very new to discord servers. If you can help me with some tips I would appreciate it


Also if you find any bugs please let me know

Also, this is my first time making a 3D game any feedback would be much apprieciated
